title: Imaginative League
body:
Imagine a league, one that has no imperfections, nothing broke, nothing unfair, a perfect league.

Imagine the league of wonders, a world with only balanced champions to fight against each other.
Imagine having actual counter play to each individual champion, and it giving actual result in the end.
Imagine having _nothing_ to complaint about, ever again.

How would you feel if there was no longer a champion that has a better outcome, with low risk, and everything depended on your actual skill, and preferences of champion and item path.

Is this a league you'd like, or would you feel like something is wrong or missing?

Imagine champion ban was counter oriented, in place of being linear to what you should/need to ban
